attributes.name: id
attributes.description: Unique identifier of the quota config instance.

attributes.name: quotaPolicy
attributes.description: Quota policy of the quota config

attributes.name: isAccessDenyEnabled
attributes.description: Whether to deny access when limit is exceeded

attributes.name: defaultHardLimit
attributes.description: Default hard limit of user and tree quotas

attributes.name: defaultSoftLimit
attributes.description: Default soft limit of user and tree quotas

attributes.name: lastUpdateTimeOfTreeQuotas
attributes.description: when tree quotas are last updated

attributes.name: lastUpdateTimeOfUserQuotas
attributes.description: when user quotas are last updated
